snippet.title: Kriegsfront Tactics Prologue - Play in Various Languages on Steam!
snippet.description:
Kriegsfront Tactics - Prologue is the proof of concept for the upcoming procedural turn-based mecha tactics RPG set in alternate 1970s Southeast Asia. In this prologue chapter, you'll get to experience combat, exploration, and the opening story of the game.

Now available to play in:
- English
- Bahasa Indonesia
- Français
- Deutsch
- Español
- Polski
- Português - Brazil
- Русский
- 中文
- Türkçe
- 日本語

Play it now for free!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2851820/Kriegsfront_Tactics__Prologue/

Wishlist Kriegsfront Tactics on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561740/Kriegsfront_Tactics/
